name: 43 Air School (Pty) Ltd
about: 43 Air School is Africa's largest and premier aviation training organization, offering world-class pilot training. As the only Jeppesen and Boeing approved ab-initio facility in Africa, we provide an Integrated Airline Transport Pilot Licence (iATPL) and additional certifications like Airline Pilot Standard Multi Crew Co-operation (APS MCC) and Boeing/Airbus Type Rating. Our experienced instructors, many of whom are Grade II or higher, ensure students receive top-notch education. With dedicated flying training areas, low air traffic density, and state-of-the-art facilities, including synthetic training devices and extensive on-campus amenities, we cater to private, commercial, airline, and military sectors. Our comprehensive training programs enable students to become airline-ready in less than 24 months, setting us at the forefront of international training standards. At 43 Air School, we are committed to delivering exceptional aviation education and opportunities.
services:
["Private Pilot
Commercial Pilot
Airline Pilot
Instructor Rating
Technical Training
EASA Exams
